result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal 4th+)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeremy Joseph Stieber

records.addlTxt:
Case called: 2:32 pm
INCLUDES 16CF228, 16CF333, 16CM132, 16TR1422.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence:
Defendant appears in person and with Atty David Christian;
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to:
16CF333:
Ct. 1 (BJ-Felony)>>DISMISS OUTRIGHT.
Ct. 2 (BJ)>>DISMISS OUTRIGHT.
Ct. 3 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia)>>DISMISS OUTRIGHT.

16CM132:
Ct. 1 (Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal 4th+))>>DRI.

16TR1422:
Ct. 1 (Drink Open Intoxicants in MV-Passenger)>>DISMISS OUTRIGHT.
COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA: 
16CF228:
Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine)>> NO CONTEST.
Ct. 2 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia)>> NO CONTEST.
Ct. 3 (BJ)>> NO CONTEST.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
16CF228:
Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine)>>  COURT w/holds finding and entry of guilt - COURT adopts written deferred entry of judgment agreement as signed by all parties and submitted to COURT.
COURT defers matter for a period of 2 Years for defendant to comply with all terms and conditions of written DEJ agreement.
If defendant is in full compliance with all terms and conditions of written DEJ agreement within that time frame and obtains no new criminal charges, State to AMEND Ct. 1 pursuant to Order. 

DEOJ RH>> 12/2/2019 @ 9:00 am
Bond continues.

Ct. 2 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia)>> Sentence W/H- 1 Year Probation, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: AODA and Follow up, Absolute Sobriety from Controlled Substances unless prescribed and only within the prescribed amounts, Counseling as recommended, No Driving without Valid Driver's License, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. Court finds 1 Day Credit if Revoked. 

Ct. 3 (BJ)>> Sentence W/H- 1 Year Probation, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: AODA and Follow up, Absolute Sobriety from Controlled Substances unless prescribed and only within the prescribed amounts, Counseling as recommended, No Driving without Valid Driver's License, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. Court finds 1 Day Credit if Revoked. 

Adjourned: 2:41 pm

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel
